comments.body: It looks like properties totalCount, idleCount, waitingCount are missing, see https://node-postgres.com/api/pool#-code-pool-totalcount-int-code-
Added. But there may still be some other missing properties or methods, since the purpose of this PR is to fix definition error rather then make it complete.
poolSize is also allowed as an alias for max
But is it documented? I can't find it from document and example.

Ah you're right I think I only saw it in the code.
Perhaps we rather avoid to add it, and sticks to max only which is the 'official' property since 7.0
Could you back up version 6 to another folder as decsribed in the [readme](https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped#i-want-to-update-a-package-to-a-new-major-version)?
I have copied the files prior to my change to folder `v6`.
